title: On Noam Chomsky and the Far-Left's Anti-Semitism (Pt. 3) | Nick Cohen | POLITICS | Rubin Report
description:
Dave Rubin of The Rubin Report talks to Nick Cohen (journalist and author of "What's Left?") about his views on Noam Chomsky and the anti-semitism that is often seen from the people on the far-left. 

Watch Dave Rubin’s full interview with Nick Cohen here: 
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5fXEp4O6Lo&list=PLEbhOtC9klbCr0iN2ANJbaV477B0eSpc6&index=192&t=0s
